column4: Hi... how can I mount an SFTP or FTP location in Ubuntu? Nautilus shows the root folder but doesnt redirect to the suitable folder. s/ftp from the terminal work as expected however.

Also, how can I have OO display documents as they do in Word. I have the correct fonts installed, but pagination is still usually a long way off. PDF isnt an option (not my choice), i'm stuck with .doc/.docx
